attributes.action: Reinstate David Nutt as chair of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newstopics/politics/lawandorder/6475239/Drug-policy-in-chaos-after-adviser-is-sacked.html

http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/life_and_style/health/article6898197.ece

We the undersigned reject the dismissal of David Nutt, seeing the action as a consequence of a government frightened by impartial scientific advice. Scientists shouldn't be dismissed when their conclusions are seen as politically dangerous; instead, they should be recognised as a much-needed source of impartiality within the realm of governance. 

If there's valid evidence surrounding a change in drugs policy, this should be upheld as an opportunity to minimise health risks and improve education to the general population. 

We therefore petition the Prime Minister to do everything within his power to reinstate David Nutt, and apologise for this overtly political manoeuvre.
